scripts.dev:with-init: concurrently -n wrangler,init -c auto "wrangler dev --local --host 0.0.0.0 --port 444" "node scripts/wait-and-init.mjs --url http://127.0.0.1:444"
scripts.dev:tunnel:auto: concurrently -n wrangler,init,tunnel -c auto "wrangler dev --local --host 0.0.0.0 --port 444" "node scripts/wait-and-init.mjs --url http://127.0.0.1:444" "node scripts/postdev.mjs --provider=auto --port 444"
scripts.dev:tunnel:cf: concurrently -n wrangler,init,tunnel -c auto "wrangler dev --local --host 0.0.0.0 --port 444" "node scripts/wait-and-init.mjs --url http://127.0.0.1:444" "node scripts/postdev.mjs --provider=cloudflare --port 444"
scripts.dev:tunnel:cf:named: concurrently -n wrangler,init,tunnel -c auto "wrangler dev --local --host 0.0.0.0 --port 444" "node scripts/wait-and-init.mjs --url http://127.0.0.1:444" "cloudflared tunnel --config scripts/cloudflared.named.yml run"
scripts.dev:tunnel:ngrok: concurrently -n wrangler,init,tunnel -c auto "wrangler dev --local --host 0.0.0.0 --port 444" "node scripts/wait-and-init.mjs --url http://127.0.0.1:444" "node scripts/postdev.mjs --provider=ngrok --port 444"
scripts.dev:tunnel:lt: concurrently -n wrangler,init,tunnel -c auto "wrangler dev --local --host 0.0.0.0 --port 444" "node scripts/wait-and-init.mjs --url http://127.0.0.1:444" "node scripts/postdev.mjs --provider=localtunnel --port 444"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:core && npm run db:ui && npm run db:app
scripts.rdb:setup: npm run rdb:core && npm run rdb:ui && npm run rdb:app
scripts.rdb:reset:core: wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --remote --file db/schema/drop-core.sql && wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --remote --file db/schema/core.sql
scripts.rdb:reset:ui: wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/drop-ui.sql && wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --remote --file db/schema/ui.sql
scripts.rdb:reset:app: wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --file db/schema/drop-app.sql && wrangler d1 execute DB --remote --file db/schema/app.sql
scripts.rdb:reset: npm run rdb:reset:core && npm run rdb:reset:ui && npm run rdb:reset:app
scripts.db:setup:local: wrangler d1 execute monopolyd1 --local --file db/schema/core.sql && wrangler d1 execute monopolyui --local --file db/schema/ui.sql && wrangler d1 execute DB --local --file db/schema/app.sql
